name: Devito
description: '''David Ljubenović''' ({{Lang-sr-cyr|Давид Љубеновић}}; born 9 May 1995), professionally known as '''Devito''' ({{Lang-sr-cyr|Девито|links=no}}), is a Serbian rapper. Originally working as a photographer and music video director, he made his official recording debut in 2018. Devito is well-known for wearing a white three-hole [[Balaclava (clothing)|balaclava]] in public to hide his true identity. He has released two studio albums - ''[[Plava krv]]'' (2023) and ''Nema spavanja'' (2025).
